title: I really need some help please
content:
I am a new comer to this forums and I have a small question. Does anyone know what the name for the dot on the lowercase "i" and "j" is?   
   
Thx in advanced. I really need help with this
author: xpixelx

comments.content: Robert Bringhurst in "The Elements of Typographic Style" (wouldn't it be great if he joined this forum?) has nothing to say on this subject, save to call it a "dot", only in reference to the fact that in Turkish there exists a "dotless i".

I've heard it called a "tittle", which sure sounds nice, but I just call it "dot".   
   
hhp

Thx alot   
   
I have had no luck looking for this either   
thx again
